Title: HC dismisses plea against BJP leader
Content: The Delhi High Court on Wednesday dismissed the contempt petition moved against BJP spokesperson Nalin Satyakam Kohli by his former wife, accusing him of wilfully violating the terms of settlement agr
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: The Delhi High Court on Wednesday dismissed the contempt petition moved against BJP spokesperson Nalin Satyakam Kohli by his former wife, accusing him of wilfully violating the terms of settlement agr
